descriptions.minesweeper: Activision has released a new Call of Duty game every year since 2005, and that streak will continue in 2024 with the next entry in the main series. But 2024's Call of Duty game, Call of Duty: Black Ops 6, will be the most notable in years. That's because it's the first new entry since Microsoft acquired

But 2024's Call of Duty game, Call of Duty: Black Ops 6, will be the most notable in years. That's because it's the first new entry since Microsoft acquired
descriptions.mimic_nights:
This is a small horror game made as part of the Ludum Dare 56 game-jam. After the game-jam we improved the game in general a bit, added localizations, tutorial, mobile and gamepad controls. 

 The point of the game is to search for a mimic among the items in a dark cabin. You have to survive seven nights in total, while the number of items gets bigger and bigger and the difficulty increases with it.

team_description: We're a team of creative Unity enthusiasts bringing your gaming visions to life with flair and finesse!
